metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-Fried Morning Glory with Garlic)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Sauté minced garlic in vegetable oil until fragrant. o Add morning glory and stir-fry until tender. o Add fish sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o Sauté minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant. o Add bok choy and stir-fry until tender. o Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions. o Pour mixture into a heatproof bowl. o Steam for 10-15 minutes until set. o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm.
Optional toppings: smoked salmon, capers, red onion, tomato slices Spread cream cheese on each half of the toasted bagel. Add optional toppings if desired.
o Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber. o Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt.
